reviews.text: The lady was very rude , she was not patient at all. I had some questions and she was getting upset , the food is amazing but the customer service is horrible .

Compre un almuerzo sencillo con una malta para llevar. Resulta que seg√∫n el cajero me deja saber la cantidad. Son $18.50. Yo le pregunto pq tanto. Que por la tarjeta que cobran un 4%. I order two chicken wraps with French fries from this restaurant in early morning.  They had not started cooking yet but the very nice lady still prepared them for me. I really appreciated that and had to give a review.  The ladies working here was very nice and me and my friend enjoyed the food. They have a variety of choices on the menu.  The place is clean. There is also an ATM machine on premises
